snippet: “On Our Hands,” at Jacob Lewis Gallery, examines familiar themes, but with a considerably more complex process.
abstract: Artist Shepard Fairey is preparing for his first solo show in New York City since 2010; September exhibition On Our Hands will feature series of new mixed-media paintings at Jacob Lewis Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “On Our Hands,” at Jacob Lewis Gallery, examines familiar themes, but with a considerably more complex process.

headline.main: In His First New York Show in Five Years, Shepard Fairey Is Still Questioning Everything
